alignItems.description_zh: 定义 align-items 样式属性。

autoFocus.description: If true, the list item is focused during the first mount. Focus will also be triggered if the value changes from false to true.
autoFocus.description_zh: 如果为 true，则列表项在第一次装载期间处于焦点位置。如果值从 false 变为 true，也会触发焦点。

children.description: The content of the component if a ListItemSecondaryAction is used it must be the last child.
children.description_zh: 组件的内容，如果使用 ListItemSecondaryAction，则它必须是最后一个子项。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

dense.description: If true, compact vertical padding designed for keyboard and mouse input is used. The prop defaults to the value inherited from the parent List component.
dense.description_zh: 如果为 true，则使用专为键盘和鼠标输入设计的紧凑型垂直填充。该 prop 默认为从父 List 组件继承的值。

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用该组件。

disableGutters.description: If true, the left and right padding is removed.
disableGutters.description_zh: 如果为 true，则删除左右填充。

divider.description: If true, a 1px light border is added to the bottom of the list item.
divider.description_zh: 如果为 true，则在列表项的底部添加一个 1px 的浅色边框。

focusVisibleClassName.description: This prop can help identify which element has keyboard focus. The class name will be applied when the element gains the focus through keyboard interaction. It's a polyfill for the CSS :focus-visible selector. The rationale for using this feature is explained here. A polyfill can be used to apply a focus-visible class to other components if needed.
focusVisibleClassName.description_zh: 此道具可以帮助识别哪个元素具有键盘焦点。当元素通过键盘交互获得焦点时，将应用类名。它是 CSS ：focus-visible 选择器的 polyfill。此处解释了使用此功能的基本原理。如果需要，可以使用 polyfill 将焦点可见类应用于其他组件。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。
